metadata.description: Vestibular-driven reflex circuits coupling head motion to eye and body stabilization.
metadata.notes: Highlights vestibular influence on motor pathways distinct from biomimetic balance controllers.

vestibulo_ocular.stimulus: Angular or linear head acceleration detected by semicircular canals and otoliths.
vestibulo_ocular.afferent: Vestibular nerve fibers to vestibular nuclei.
vestibulo_ocular.integration: Vestibular nuclei projecting to ocular motor nuclei via medial longitudinal fasciculus.
vestibulo_ocular.effector: Eye movements opposite head motion stabilizing gaze.

vestibulospinal.stimulus: Head tilt or body sway altering otolith firing.
vestibulospinal.afferent: Otolith afferents to lateral and medial vestibular nuclei.
vestibulospinal.integration: Vestibulospinal tracts influencing axial and proximal limb tone.
vestibulospinal.efferent: Alpha and gamma motor neurons of extensors.
vestibulospinal.effector: Postural adjustments countering sway and supporting antigravity stance.

vestibulocollic.afferent: Semicircular canal signals to vestibular nuclei.
vestibulocollic.integration: Medial vestibulospinal tract engaging neck motoneurons.
vestibulocollic.efferent: Spinal accessory and cervical motor neurons.
vestibulocollic.effector: Neck muscle activation stabilizing head orientation.
